main event: A person witnessed an oval-shaped object hovering over their unit during a test run in 1962.
interesting points: The object made no sound and hovered about 100 yards away for around 3 minutes.
The object then took off at a very high speed and disappeared from sight.
The witness had seen similar objects before and had no explanation for what they saw.
The witness was part of a small squadron or unit on a mission when the sighting occurred.
The sighting occurred in the U.S.A.F. in the year 1962.
witnesses: a person in a small squadron or unit
photographs: no photographs, only a written report
